series_description: This series documents the awarding of grant monies to the localities for the preservation and management of their permanent public records as authorized by the General Assembly in 1990, (
retention_statement: Retain in agency for 10 years after the completion of the project, then transfer to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, Section 17.1-275 (A.2.). The series contains the grant application, certification sheet, and supporting documentation for the project. Project status reports are also maintained in this series.

series_description: This series documents the applications for grant awards under the Virginia Circuit Court Records Preservation Program (CCRPP) that were rejected by the grant review board.
